# Changelog

## [0.1.2]- 2022-01-06
### Fixed
- Fix Loop sort by priority to sort properly

## [0.1.1] - 2022-01-05
### Fixed
- Fix accidental system yield error message in Loop

### Changed
- Accidentally yielding or erroring in a system does not prevent other systems from running.

## [0.1.0] - 2022-01-02

- Initial release
